0.text: Hello there, Twitter! This is an example Tweet using Aida!

1.text: When is the best time to post? I'll tell you! I post between 9am and 2pm every other day!

2.text: This is a sample tweet! It shouldn't be the same as anything else. I'm just testing out the hashtag functionality. #example #hashtag

3.text: What's another good way to have a Twitter bot act more human? Don't tweet every 30 seconds!

4.text: Who knew that coding your own Twitter bot would take so much time? Aida is almost in beta!
